roleset.name: attach, making connected, include in some group
roleset.note: CONNECT-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus, automatic expansion via verbnet; adjectival 'connected' based on BOLT-7. Member of VNcls mix-22.1-2-1, tape-22.4 (from connect.01-v)
CONNECTED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from connected.01-j)

CONNECTION-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry connect.01, OntoNotes grouping connection-n senses 1, 4& 8; maps to VN class mix-22.1-2-1. Comparison to verb-associate.01. Framed by Claire. (from connection.01-n)

example.name: connect-v: plural arg1
example.text: Machines using the 486 are expected to challenge higher-priced work stations and minicomputers in applications such as so-called servers, which-1 *trace*-1 connect groups of computers together, and in computer-aided design.

example.name: connect-v: conjoined arg1's
example.text: It is a maze of halls that-1 *trace*-1 connects film rooms, elaborate spas and weight-training centers that testify to a richer, more free-spending era.
example.arg: film rooms, elaborate spas and weight-training centers that testify to a richer, more free-spending era

example.name: connect-v: split arg1's
example.text: The subsidiary also increased reserves by $140 million, however, and set aside an additional $25 million for claims-1 connected *trace*-1 with Hurricane Hugo.

example.name: connect-v: with instrument
example.text: John connected the fragments of his coffee cup with duct tape.
example.arg: the fragments of his coffee cup

example.name: connected-j
example.text: These two figures , 7.5 % and 4 % , are closely connected and interact with each other . There is not only objective and practical planning , but also focus on people 's livelihood .

example.name: connection-n: Arg1, all things connected in one mention
example.text: The connection between church and state is inescapable.

example.name: connection-n: Args 0 & 2
example.text: John's first connection to the Internet occurred yesterday at noon.

example.name: connection-n: Args 0, 1, 2
example.text: Many of those Evangelicals may not agree with his connection of environmentalism to sin.

example.name: connection-n: All arguments
example.text: John's connection of department computers to shady websites using an unsecure connection led to a record number of viruses on the machines.

example.name: connection-n: just arg 2
example.text: Without admitting or denying wrongdoing , the firm consented to findings that it failed to respond `` in a timely manner '' to the NASD 's requests for information in connection with a customer complaint .
